```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
ocean_data <- read_csv(here("data", "Data.csv"))
```

```{r}
mean_density_adult <- ocean_data[6:18, ] %>% 
  row_to_names(1) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  select(!c(na_2, na_3, na_4, na_5)) %>% 
  rename(animal = na) %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  rename(confidence_interval = each_sampling_date)

adult_2009 <- mean_density_adult %>% 
  select(animal, rarotonga, aitutaki, confidence_interval)

adult_2018 <- mean_density_adult %>% 
  select(animal, rarotonga_2, aitutaki_2, confidence_interval)
```

```{r}
mean_number_new_young <- ocean_data[25:52, ]
```
